# [Interview #874: Twitter 2013 (WoT), Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=874#1)

#### Terez

For a complete catalog of Brandon's tweets, visit the
[Twitter Portal](http://brandonsanderson.com/article/)
at Brandon's website. Be wary of spoilers for
*A Memory of Light*
, here and elsewhere in the database.
